TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ChannelBase extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject, class System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts
Public MustInherit Class ChannelBase Inherits CommunicationObject Implements IChannel, IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts
public ref class ChannelBase abstract : System::ServiceModel::Channels::CommunicationObject, System::ServiceModel::Channels::IChannel, System::ServiceModel::IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts
type ChannelBase = class inherit CommunicationObject interface IChannel interface ICommunicationObject interface IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts
type ChannelBase = class inherit CommunicationObject interface ICommunicationObject interface IChannel interface IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts

summary.span: 提供自定义通道的基实现。

span.span: Provides the base implementation for custom channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-class-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-class-note.md)] 类提供 接口的抽象基类实现。The class provides an abstract base class implementation of the interface. 同时，还要求每个通道必须与通道管理器关联。It also requires that each channel be associated with a channel manager. 请注意，可用于创建 实例的唯一构造函数需要 `channelManager` 输入参数。Note that the only constructor available for creating instances of requires a `channelManager` input parameter. 通过继承状态机的 实现来对状态更改进行管理。State changes are managed by inheriting from the implementation of the state machine. 会从与之关联的 获取打开、关闭、发送和接收操作的默认通信超时。The gets its default communication timeouts for the open, close, send and receive operations from the associated with it. 还负责对管理器加以管理。The also manages the manager for you. 除了公开对管理器的引用之外，该基类还会在创建和销毁通道时通知管理器。In addition to exposing a reference to the manager, the base class also notifies the manager when channels are created and destroyed. 但是对管理器的引用只在销毁通道之前有效。But the reference to the manager is only good until the channel is destroyed. 即使您使用基类，也必须提供打开和关闭通道的行为。Even if you do use the base class, you must still provide behaviors for opening and closing the channel. 这些方法的默认实现不会提供有用信息。The default implementations of these methods do not provide useful information. 此外，任何时候要实现通道，都必须确保重写 。You must also make sure to override whenever you implement a channel. 是一种通过通道堆栈传达信息的绝佳方式，无需知道哪些通道低于你，或者上述哪些通道可执行查询。 is an excellent way to communicate information along the channel stack without having to know what channels are below you, or what channels above you may perform queries. 定义可从中查询可用信息的接口。Define interfaces that can be queried for available information. 如果不能识别 的类型参数，则委托给堆栈中的下一个通道，如果要在堆栈底部创建一个新的传输通道，则返回 `null`。Whenever you do not recognize the type argument for , delegate down to the next channel in the stack or return `null` if you are creating a new transport channel at the bottom of the stack.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，可用于创建 实例的唯一构造函数需要 `channelManager` 输入参数。Note that the only constructor available for creating instances of requires a `channelManager` input parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property DefaultCloseTimeout As TimeSpan
protected: virtual property TimeSpan DefaultCloseTimeout { TimeSpan get(); };
protected internal override TimeSpan DefaultCloseTimeout { get; }
Protected Friend Overrides ReadOnly Property DefaultCloseTimeout As TimeSpan
protected public: virtual property TimeSpan DefaultCloseTimeout { TimeSpan get(); };

summary.span: 获取为完成关闭操作提供的默认时间间隔。

span.span: Gets the default interval of time provided for a close operation to complete.

value.span: 默认的 ，指定在超时前可用于完成关闭操作的时间。

span.span: The default that specifies how long the close operation has to complete before timing out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取与通道 关联的 。Gets the associated with for the channel. 时间可能较长的操作必须设置超时。All operations that are potentially lengthy must have a timeout. 不使用明确超时值的方法必须委托给将具有默认超时值的方法，否则不得进行任何阻止工作。Methods that do not take explicit timeouts, must delegate to those methods with default timeouts or must not do any work that blocks. 超时是完成高级别操作的总时间限制，因此任何重试操作只能在前面的操作尚未耗尽时间之前进行。Timeouts are the total limit for high-level operations for which they are to complete, so any retries must be limited to the time not already accessed by earlier tries.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property DefaultOpenTimeout As TimeSpan
protected: virtual property TimeSpan DefaultOpenTimeout { TimeSpan get(); };
protected internal override TimeSpan DefaultOpenTimeout { get; }
Protected Friend Overrides ReadOnly Property DefaultOpenTimeout As TimeSpan
protected public: virtual property TimeSpan DefaultOpenTimeout { TimeSpan get(); };

span.span: Gets the default interval of time provided for an open operation to complete.

value.span: 默认的 ，指定在超时前可用于完成打开操作的时间。

span.span: The default that specifies how long the open operation has to complete before timing out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取与通道 关联的 。Gets the associated with for the channel. 时间可能较长的操作必须设置超时。All operations that are potentially lengthy must have a timeout. 不使用明确超时值的方法必须委托给将具有默认超时值的方法，否则不得进行任何阻止工作。Methods that do not take explicit timeouts, must delegate to those methods with default timeouts or must not do any work that blocks. 超时是完成高级别操作的总时间限制，因此任何重试操作只能在前面的操作尚未耗尽时间之前进行。Timeouts are the total limit for high-level operations for which they are to complete, so any retries must be limited to the time not already accessed by earlier tries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取与通道 关联的 。Gets the associated with for the channel. 时间可能较长的操作必须设置超时。All operations that are potentially lengthy must have a timeout. 不使用明确超时值的方法必须委托给将具有默认超时值的方法，否则不得进行任何阻止工作。Methods that do not take explicit timeouts, must delegate to those methods with default timeouts or must not do any work that blocks. 超时是完成高级别操作的总时间限制，因此任何重试操作只能在前面的操作尚未耗尽时间之前进行。Timeouts are the total limit for high-level operations for which they are to complete, so any retries must be limited to the time not already accessed by earlier tries.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual T GetProperty<T> () where T : class;
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !!T GetProperty<class T>() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetProperty(Of T As Class) () As T
abstract member GetProperty : unit -> 'T (requires 'T : null) override this.GetProperty : unit -> 'T (requires 'T : null)

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 方法正在查询的类型化对象。

span.span: The typed object for which the method is querying.

summary.span: 从通道堆栈的适当层，返回所请求的类型化对象（如果存在）。

span.span: Returns the typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the channel stack.

returns.span: 如果存在，则返回所请求的类型化对象 ，如果不存在，则返回 。

span.span: The typed object requested, if it is present, or , if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可请求从通道堆栈的适当层返回一个类型化对象，如用于设置属性或获取状态的接口。Use this to request a typed object such as an interface for setting properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the channel stack. 如果某个层支持返回所请求的对象，则该层会返回对象。If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不支持，则该层会将调用委托给堆栈中的下一层。If not, it delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. 如果到达堆栈底部仍然没有通道层支持所请求的对象，则该方法返回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no channel layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`. 此外，任何时候要实现通道，都必须确保重写 。You must also make sure to override whenever you implement a channel. 是一种通过通道堆栈传达信息的绝佳方式，无需知道哪些通道低于你，或者上述哪些通道可执行查询。 is an excellent way to communicate information along the channel stack without having to know what channels are below you, or what channels above you may perform queries. 定义可从中查询可用信息的接口。Define interfaces that can be queried for available information. 如果不能识别 的类型参数，则委托给堆栈中的下一个通道，如果要在堆栈底部创建一个新的传输通道，则返回 `null`。Whenever you do not recognize the type argument for , delegate down to the next channel in the stack or return `null` if you are creating a new transport channel at the bottom of the stack.

summary.span: 获取 close 方法（由通信对象调用）在超时之前的时间间隔。

span.span: The that specifies the interval of time to wait for the close method to time out.
